subject: Leadership
title: Transformational Leadership
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Transformational Leadership.

hook.text: She didn't just manage the teamâ€”she made them believe they could change the industry. That's transformation.

buildup.text: Transformational leaders inspire followers to exceed expectations by connecting work to a larger purpose.

discovery.text: Burns identified four pillars: idealized influence, inspirational motivation, intellectual stimulation, and care.

twist.text: Without guardrails, it can become cult-like. Charisma without ethics produces manipulation, not transformation.

climax.text: The best transformational leaders raise others up, not just themselves. They create more leaders, not followers.

punchline.text: Change the person, change the team. That's transformational leadership.

quiz.question: What risk does transformational leadership carry?
options: Charisma without ethics can become manipulation
